It's not an internet forum. It's not spray, beta, or slander. It's not a text message or a tick mark or a tick list or a film.  It's all those things.  This year, Red Bull and Chuck Fryberger Films have teamed up to bring you a glimpse inside an elite network of athletes who live their lives to train, compete, explore, and inspire by pushing their limits on the hardest climbing in the world. The best climbers in the world are all connected in a constant cycle of training, preparation, competition, and outdoor challenges. The Network connects both past and present - bouldering, sport, and competition climbing - and this cutting-edge film tangles the viewer inside the spider web of connections that makes up the world of the professional rock climber.  Join 6-time world cup champion Killian Fischhuber as he and the best in the game explore areas old and new for adventures, lifestyle, and some of the hardest moves in the world.","popularity":2.532,"poster_path":"/iwFDkZ68Xv8KG0tUF9Rhfoi2aEv.jpg","release_date":"2013-03-31","title":"The Network","video":false,"vote_average":10.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99,12],"id":395150,"original_language":"fr","original_title":"La Collection Cousteau N°34-1 | La Légende du Lac Titicaca","overview":"","popularity":4.794,"poster_path":"/7bmzzS9eXA1j7fr0TjGzuyrdG8d.jpg","release_date":"1968-05-01","title":"The Cousteau Collection N°34-1 | The Legend of Lake Titicaca","video":false,"vote_average":7.8,"vote_count":2},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/zDAYOzbmcskMeJx7e1UumodYwpd.jpg","genre_ids":[12,99],"id":718708,"original_language":"en","original_title":"The KFC","overview":"Five Kiwis take on a paragliding adventure in Tanzania, with the ultimate aim to fly from the summit of Mt Kilimanjaro.","popularity":2.503,"poster_path":"/zceWDmLH9P4j6QWoDC356Kk0Cy1.jpg","release_date":"2020-06-27","title":"The KFC","video":false,"vote_average":10.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":718773,"original_language":"en","original_title":"The Breath Connection","overview":"A portrait of free diver Kathryn Nevatt, former World Champion and current New Zealand record holder in all three disciplines.","popularity":1.089,"poster_path":"/ze4a36xzeoBapupX9u1w5sdnxcw.jpg","release_date":"2019-05-01","title":"The Breath Connection","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/1O2oTbLgrjluscPv2T517P0lgO6.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":17699,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Coral Reef Adventure","overview":"Coral Reef Adventure follows the real-life expedition of ocean explorers and underwater filmmakers Howard and Michele Hall. It is respected by climbers around the world. Distilled examines what makes the climbing here so potent.  Andy Cave first climbed in Scotland as a teenager. This was the start of a lifelong journey for Andy, which took him from the depths of a Yorkshire coal mine to the peaks of the Himalayas. As the story unfolds we see dramatic footage of Andy climbing some of Scotland’s classic and most challenging winter routes in the full spectrum of conditions that Scotland’s mountains can conjure.  Distilled is a celebration of Scottish winter climbing and a poignant profile of a life spent in the mountains.","popularity":1.103,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2013-11-18","title":"Distilled","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/2Lvel5GmY7Kpdhq19E9mvOBWhrj.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":709275,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Descent","overview":"Dutch ice freediver Kiki Bosch swims in the world's coldest waters without a wetsuit as therapy for a trauma she experienced, and to inspire others.","popularity":3.421,"poster_path":"/stDCYsRNz1QQb9XE6ZpWR5FmNcP.jpg","release_date":"2020-06-10","title":"Descent","video":false,"vote_average":4.0,"vote_count":3},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":242783,"original_language":"en","original_title":"The Old Breed","overview":"“Getting to the top matters,” or so says veteran alpinist Mark Richey as he prepares to climb Saser Kangri II, at 7,518 meters the world’s second highest unclimbed mountain. In “The Old Breed”, co- director and climber Freddie Wilkinson takes the audience with him on a journey to the heart of one of the last unexplored patches of mountain wilderness: the war-inflicted eastern Karakoram range.
